allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Ochlik Bygg AB website prototypes

This repository contains a React-based website showcase for Ochlik Bygg AB, a Swedish construction company, featuring three distinct design prototypes (Modern, Bold, and Classic) plus HTML prototypes.

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
